verses.verse: Now <S%H3405>Jericho<s%> was straightly <S%H5462>shut<s%> up <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out, and <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H7200>See,<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> thereof, and the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of <S%H2428>valor.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and <S%H5362>go<s%> <S%H5362>round<s%> about the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>once.<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> shall you <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams'<s%> <S%H3104>horns:<s%> and the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> shall <S%H8628>blow<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that when they make a <S%H4900>long<s%> blast with the <S%H3104>ram's<s%> <S%H7161>horn,<s%> and when you <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H7321>shout<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout;<s%> and the <S%H2346>wall<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> down <S%H8478>flat,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H5927>ascend<s%> up every <S%H376>man<s%> straight <S%H5048>before<s%> him.

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H5375>Take<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant,<s%> and let <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bear<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams'<s%> <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5674>Pass<s%> on, and <S%H5437>compass<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and let him that is <S%H2502>armed<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the ark of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H559>spoken<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> that the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>bearing<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams'<s%> <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> them.

And the <S%H2502>armed<s%> men <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> that <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> and the rear <S%H622>guard<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> on, and <S%H8628>blowing<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> You shall not <S%H7321>shout,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> make any <S%H8085>noise<s%> with your <S%H6963>voice,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall any <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H3318>proceed<s%> out of your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H559>bid<s%> you <S%H7321>shout;<s%> then shall you <S%H7321>shout.<s%>

So the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city,<s%> <S%H5362>going<s%> <S%H5362>about<s%> it <S%H259>once:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H3885>lodged<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> up the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H7651>seven<s%> priests <S%H5375>bearing<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H7782>trumpets<s%> of <S%H3104>rams'<s%> <S%H3104>horns<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> <S%H1980>continually,<s%> and <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and the <S%H2502>armed<s%> men <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; but the rear <S%H622>guard<s%> <S%H1980>came<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H1980>going<s%> <S%H413>on,<s%> and <S%H8628>blowing<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets.<s%>

And the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H259>once,<s%> and <S%H7725>returned<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> <S%H3541>so<s%> they <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that they <S%H7925>rose<s%> <S%H7925>early<s%> about the <S%H5927>dawning<s%> of the <S%H7837>day,<s%> and <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> after the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H4941>manner<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6471>times.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass at the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H6471>time,<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets,<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7321>Shout;<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H2764>accursed,<s%> even it, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are therein, to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> shall <S%H2421>live,<s%> she and <S%H3605>all<s%> that are with her in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> that we <S%H7971>sent.<s%>

And you, in any wise <S%H8104>keep<s%> yourselves from the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing, <S%H6435>lest<s%> you make yourselves <S%H2763>accursed,<s%> when you <S%H3947>take<s%> of the <S%H2764>accursed<s%> thing, and <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> a <S%H2764>curse,<s%> and <S%H5916>trouble<s%> it.

But <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and <S%H1270>iron,<s%> are <S%H6944>consecrated<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> they shall <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> when the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H8628>blew<s%> with the <S%H7782>trumpets:<s%> and it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>trumpet,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted<s%> with a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H8643>shout,<s%> that the <S%H2346>wall<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> down <S%H8478>flat,<s%> so that the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up into the <S%H5892>city,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> straight <S%H5048>before<s%> him, and they <S%H3920>took<s%> the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

And they utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that was in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> both <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H5288>young<s%> and <S%H2205>old,<s%> and <S%H7794>ox,<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> and <S%H2543>ass,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

But <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> that had <S%H7270>spied<s%> out the <S%H776>country,<s%> <S%H935>Go<s%> into the <S%H2181>harlot's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3318>bring<s%> out <S%H8033>there<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that she has, as you <S%H7650>swore<s%> to her.

And the <S%H5288>young<s%> men that were <S%H7270>spies<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> in, and <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H7343>Rahab,<s%> and her <S%H1>father,<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> and her <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that she had; and they <S%H3318>brought<s%> out <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H4940>kindred,<s%> and <S%H5117>left<s%> them <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And they <S%H8313>burnt<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that was therein: <S%H7535>only<s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H5178>brass<s%> and of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> they <S%H5414>put<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H2421>saved<s%> <S%H7343>Rahab<s%> the <S%H2181>harlot<s%> <S%H2421>alive,<s%> and her <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that she had; and she <S%H3427>dwells<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> she <S%H2244>hid<s%> the <S%H4397>messengers,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7270>spy<s%> out <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H7650>adjured<s%> them at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H779>Cursed<s%> be the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that <S%H6965>rises<s%> up and <S%H1129>builds<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H3405>Jericho:<s%> he shall lay the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> thereof in his <S%H1060>firstborn,<s%> and in his <S%H6810>youngest<s%> son shall he <S%H5324>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>gates<s%> of it.
So the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was with <S%H3091>Joshua;<s%> and his <S%H8089>fame<s%> was noised throughout <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>country.<s%>
